description: Shops, restaurants and hairdressers are serving customers for the first time since March.
title: Coronavirus: Guernsey reopens for business after 10 weeks
title_page: Coronavirus: Guernsey reopens for business after 10 weeks - BBC News
maintext: Jewellery designer Becky Rowe, 34, said although she felt "lucky" to have been able to fulfil some orders by other means while her shop - Becky Rowe Jewellery - was closed, there had been a loss of business.
